hints.content: Every time we move right on the number line, we add the distance we move.

$718\redE{+200}=918$

[[☃ image 1]]

Let's keep adding to label the other points on the number line.

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 718, 918, and question mark. An arrow labeled plus 200 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at 918. !

A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 718, 918, and 958. An arrow labeled plus 200 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at 918. An arrow labeled plus 40 is above the number line beginning at 918 and ending at 958. !

hints.content:
This leads to the same sum because, altogether, that is a distance of:

$\redE{200}+\purpleE{40}= \blueE{240}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 718, 918, and 958. An arrow labeled plus 200 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at 918. An arrow labeled plus 40 is above the number line beginning at 918 and ending at 958. An arrow labeled plus 240 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at 958. !

hints.content:
This is Isi's completed number line:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 718, 918, and 958. An arrow labeled plus 200 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at 918. An arrow labeled plus 40 is above the number line beginning at 918 and ending at 958. An arrow labeled plus 240 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at 958. !

question.content:
Isi thinks about $718+\blueE{240}$ as $718+\redE{200}+\purpleE{40}$ to solve in their head. Here is part of a number line to represent their thinking.

[[☃ image 1]]

**Which number line correctly labels the other tick marks?** 

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A number line with 3 unequally spaced tick marks. From left to right, the tick marks are labeled 718, an unlabeled tick mark, and an unlabeled tick mark. An arrow labeled plus 200 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at the first unlabeled point. An arrow labeled plus 40 is above the number line beginning at the first unlabeled point and ending at the second unlabeled point. An arrow labeled plus 240 is above the number line beginning at 718 and ending at the second unlabeled point. !
